source.c462b03e: In this analysis we'll look at the forests fires in Brazil along the years, analysing their frequency, location and if they are increasing or not, this is an ongoing analysis.
source.675a5af4: The numbers are increasing along the years, besides the Amazon destruction, the fires are also a threat for the many indigenous villages in the state.
source.ffeaca9c: As we can see in the chart, Mato Grosso is the state with the highest number of fires, followed by Paraíba and São Paulo. The high number in Mato Grosso is related to farmers who use the fires to clean and manage their territories.
source.a7e5d935: The prohibitive period starts in July and end in October, during this period the use of fires for territory cleaning is forbidden, and whoever do it may pay an amount of 1k up to 7.5k Reais and end up in prison for 6 months to 4 years, even so, there're still a good number of fires in these months as we can see in the chart.
